title: API pricing protests caused Reddit to crash for 3 hours
description: Thousands of subreddits going dark broke Reddit's website, mobile app.

title: Nature bans AI-generated art from its 153-year-old science journal
description: "The process of publishing ... is underpinned by a shared commitment to integrity."

title: “Clearly predatory”: Western Digital sparks panic, anger for age-shaming HDDs
description: Drives automatically get a "warning" flag if powered on for 3 years.

title: Google’s ad tech dominance spurs more antitrust charges, report says
description: Google's ad revenue amounted to nearly $225 billion in 2022.

title: Report: FTC will file to block Microsoft’s $69B Activision Blizzard acquisition
description: The injunction could disrupt the deal as its mid-July deadline approaches.

title: Microsoft’s GeForce Now Game Pass offering is aimed straight at UK regulators
description: UK regulators were concerned about cloud gaming. Is this a useful concession?

title: Musk stiffing Google could unleash yet more abuse on Twitter, report says
description: Musk's top priorities seem to be cutting costs and removing spam bots from DMs.

title: M2 Ultra Mac Studio review: Who needs a Mac Pro, anyway?
description: The realities of Apple Silicon make the Studio the best bet for most pros.

title: AI-powered church service in Germany draws a large crowd
description: "I was positively surprised how well it worked," said one attendee.

title: “Lensed” supernova could shed light on fundamental forces shaping Universe
description: Such objects could help refine models for Hubble Constant, dark energy, and dark matter.

title: Ferrari wins the 24 Hours of Le Mans after a 50-year absence
description: After an absence of 50 years, it's like Ferrari never went away.

title: Florida man gets flesh-eating infection from human bite during family fight
description: The man declined to say what sparked the fight or which relative bit him.

title: Ex-Samsung executive alleged to have stolen tech to recreate chip plant in China
description: Six others also indicted as Korea toughens response to leakage of secrets.

title: Review: Apple’s 15-inch MacBook Air says what it is and is what it says
description: Like the M2 Pro Mac mini, it's a bridge between Apple's low- and high-end Macs.
